name: Impossibox
description: In Impossibox work your way through 50, sometimes seemingly impossible, levels and show the world what you are made of! Collect the coins to clear the levels. Impossibox has everything a tough platformer needs to challenge your skill.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 35 MB available space
